title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc to create a .jar file with the outjar option, the resulting .jar file does not include a MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: When I call ajc with the sourceroots argument set to <mydir> and the outjar argument set to <my.jar>, an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, the created file does not have a valid MANIFEST.MF file inside.
EB: The output file created by the ajc outjar command does not include the required MANIFEST.MF file, making it an invalid jar file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the ajc command with the sourceroots argument set to <mydir> and the outjar argument set to <my.jar>.
2. Check the resulting .jar file and confirm that it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
